messages.subject: Conference, sand, Alaska
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/16/02 1:01:37 PM Central Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:  LOL!! I have
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/16/02 1:01:37 PM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Is it possible to NOT carry around sand? >>

LOL!! I have some embedded in my eardrums I think.

"ps Ren, I think you are homesick for Alaska"

Am I that transparent??! Actually, I have a love/hate affair with that damn
state. It gets into your blood like lust and you can't get it out, but I
dread the thought of ever having to live there again. Fortunately my dh is
not attracted to it at ALL, so I won't be moving there any time soon.
I think once you've lived places you love, there's always somewhere to miss.
I miss parts of the NW...the food, the progressive ideas, the
mountains....sigh.
But I am happy living here. I need the beach at this point in my life, and
the small town life.
Ren
